actions.name: Cloud Nine

cost.trigger: A creature on the field uses an attack or ability to set Weather.

actions.description:
Trigger: A creature on the field uses an attack or ability to set Weather.
Effect: The triggering action fails and becomes @Affliction[disabled] 5 if it was an attack, or @Affliction[nullified] 5 if it was an Ability. This Ability cannot be triggered against Intense Weathers.

system.description:
Trigger: A creature on the field uses an attack or ability to set Weather.
Effect: The triggering action fails and becomes @Affliction[disabled] 5 if it was an attack, or @Affliction[nullified] 5 if it was an Ability. This Ability cannot be triggered against Intense Weathers.
